Html:
Hi,

Thanks for reading. I have a heavily formatted excel file (2003) i need to open, edit and save. I have used the Excel5 reader and writer, but keep getting the following error message on the browser

"Notice: iconv() [function.iconv]: Detected an illegal character in input string in C:\xampp\htdocs\lims\empty_folder1\excel3\Classes\PHPExcel\Writer\Excel5\Worksheet.php on line 1553"

The file is saved, but all original formatting is removed from excel file. I would be really grateful for any help, advice or direction, thanks.

Regards,
Unfortunately, formatting is currently not supported by the Excel5 reader.
If it's possible, just save the Excel5 file as an Excel2007 workbook (using MS's compatability pack). PHPExcel could then open it up while still retaining the formatting.
Update: Please note that a good deal of style support has been added for the Excel5 reader in the latest source code.
